title: Airfoil section referenced geometry
description: Represents sensor positions or surface nodes

xy_coordinates.title: XY coordinates
xy_coordinates.description: Two arrays of XY coordinates of node locations, normalised to [0,1]. If used for panel-code solver inputs these should be in a counterclockwise order from trailing edge. If used for sensor nodes, should be ordered by sensor number.

radial_coordinates.description: Defines the radial positions of the nodes in xy_coordinates

oneOf.description: A single value of r/r_tip determining the radial position of all x,y coordinates (e.g. on a cylinder)
An array of r/r_tip values the same size as `x_coordinates` and `y_coordinates` determining the radial position of each x,y coordinate (allowing non-cylindrical positioning)

ordering.title: Ordering of coordinate values
ordering.description: 'acw' represents anticlockwise from the trailing edge (for panel solvers). 'unknown' may represent some other ordering eg by sensor node index.

notes.description: Add notes about where these coordinates came from
